author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> for rollcall #3, once you have the magicians post, leave a comment with the link here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/944 (re @ethrnd_rollcall_bot: <spacemonkeyforta> [reply]: <@365300888354422794> I saw the agenda for the next few weeks of calls. Two questions:

1. What's the agenda for the Precompile RIP call? We are posting a Precompile RIP proposal on Magicians tmrw and would like to join if relevant to us. 
2. How do we get added to agenda for Rollcall #3?)

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> for the precompile breakout call this week, I am putting together the announcement post right now, will link here within the next hour, should have all the details you need to see if it's a good fit for you to join!

author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> Okay - this week's breakout session on Wednesday will be on precompiles in the RIP context. The idea is to also talk about related general RIP process questions, like how to best keep track of implementation status of finalized RIPs by individual teams.

As always, you can find the full agenda (and suggest additions) in the announcement post: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/rollcall-breakout-3-precompiles-and-the-rip-process/18508?u=adietrichs

I will share the link shortly before the call again. See you all on the call!

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> that's correct! Always the second Wednesday of the month.

author: bridge-bot
content: <adietrichs> ah I see why you highlighted the February, it's indeed a typo in the corresponding github issue. yes, Feb 14.
